normalised: Flash sales, eh? Reminds me of the chaos outside I I T Delhi during placements! Laughing out loud. Are these genuine deals or just Chakravyuh kind of traps? Last time, I bought a kurta for rupee ninety nine, only to find it is made of something my nani would disapprove of! Rolling on the floor laughing. Need to be quicker than Raj from D D L J to snag a good bargain, I guess. Still, sometimes you do find a gem! Happy shopping, folks! What are your best flash sale finds? Thinking face. Share your stories!
